content: I love it when I find a good spot for a coffee. This one has it all. Fairly calm and quiet. Close to the museums in Ueno, so some foot traffic for people watching. Trees. Shade.

photo.alt: The view from the patio of a cafe. In front is a quiet road, and on the other side green trees and some pedestrians walking by an old brick wall. Itâ€™s a runny day, but the photo is taken from the shade of an awning.
